segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s making me so happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, and it’s actually kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall, and it’s going to be hilarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, and she has no idea what’s coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, it’s almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t wait to see what happens next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is going to be a great story to tell later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so perfectly chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t get hurt, but it’s still funny.
segments.speaker: PAR
